General.Name: Zhejiang Longsheng Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Longsheng Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of chemical products. It offers dyes, intermediates, additives, water reducers, and inorganic chemicals. The company is also involved in the production and sales of auto parts; and real estate development. Zhejiang Longsheng Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1970 and is based in Shaoxing, the People's Republic of China.

4.Name: Mr. Jianfang  Yao
4.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Director
